AboutSection.title: What is Demosmap?
AboutSection.description: Demosmap is a government intelligence platform that converts data into decisions and micro-segmented communication into trust. We help governments and institutions deeply understand the context and the citizenry they govern through the massive integration of information, data, and citizen opinion in real-time.

step1.title: Understand
step1.description: The real context of the territorial area of action, combining data with citizen perception.

step2.title: Measure
step2.description: In real-time the evaluation of the maximum authority, management, and public policies.

step3.title: Detect
step3.description: Demands, risks, and opportunities before they turn into a crisis.

step4.title: Optimize
step4.description: Investments and public policies based on evidence, not intuitions.

step5.title: Strengthen
step5.description: Trust and legitimacy, establishing a direct and micro-segmented communication channel with citizens based on perceptions and needs.

Services.mainTitle: Demosmap transforms information into intelligent management capability

service1.title: Total Source Integration
service1.description: Open Data, own data, external data and public opinion.

service2.title: Continuous Citizen Perception
service2.description: Through strategic surveys and multi-channel micro-surveys viewable in real-time.

service3.title: Advanced Micro-segmentation
service3.description: Enabling understanding and direct communication to specific audiences based on their profile, needs, and territorial area.

service4.title: Action Capability
service4.description: Completes the loop between analysis and direct communication (WhatsApp and Push Notifications).

service5.title: GovTech Focus
service5.description: Specifically designed for the logic, timing, and challenges of public management in the 21st century.

TargetAudience.impactStatement: Governing well today requires understanding better, deciding with evidence, and communicating with precision
